violations.description: No try-catch block found. FirebaseAuthError with code 'auth/id-token-expired' - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST catch and handle expired token errors. Return 401 Unauthorized to client and require re-authentication. DO NOT retry with same token - it's permanently expired.
